Different Crime.Crime Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
procedural_fairness: assessed whether the visa officer's decision was reasonable or breached procedural fairness
evidence_assessment: visa officer found her skills insufficient for daycare work based on interview notes
decision_outcome: Court upheld the visa officer's decision, dismissing the judicial review application
standard_of_review: reasonableness of the visa officer's decision

legal_basis: Subsection 200(3) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
decision_reasoning: visa officer's factual findings and procedural fairness
application_details: Applicant's work permit application rejected due to lack of relevant childcare experience
procedure_followed: Judicial review assessed the visa officer's factual findings and procedural fairness
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; visa officer's decision upheld
conclusion_outcome: The visa officer's decision was reasonable and within acceptable outcomes
